mapper.select:
select count(*) from XMK_AQSMFH t left join (select count(*) jhsl,a4.id from plan_af a1 left join sck_aqsmfh a2 on a1.sckid=a2.id left join sck_aqsmfh_ld a3 on a2.xmbm=a3.xmbm left join xmk_aqsmfh a4 on a3.xmkid=a4.id group by a4.id) t1 on t.id=t1.id where 1=1 and (sbthcd <=7 or zsyj is not null)
${unitcode}
${distcode}
and roadname like '%'||(#{roadname})||'%'
and jhnf like '%'||(#{jhnf})||'%'
and (zszt like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or zszt is null) and sbthcd=7
and (decode(zszt,null,'未审核',zszt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or (zsyj is not null and sbthcd != 7))
and zsyj is not null and sbthcd != 7
and zsyj = '同意' and sbthcd = 7 and (decode(zszt,null,'未审核',zszt) like '已审核')
${jsdj}
${gldj}
and roadcode like '%'||(#{roadcode})||'%'
and throadcode like '%'||(#{throadcode})||'%'
and roadname like '%'||(#{throadname})||'%'
${tsdq}
and xmklx like '%'||(#{xmklx})||'%'
and decode(t1.jhsl,null,'无','有') like #{bzls}||'%'

select count(*) sbthcd,decode(sum(zlc),null,0,sum(zlc)) zlc from XMK_AQSMFH t left join (select count(*) jhsl,a4.id from plan_af a1 left join sck_aqsmfh a2 on a1.sckid=a2.id left join sck_aqsmfh_ld a3 on a2.xmbm=a3.xmbm left join xmk_aqsmfh a4 on a3.xmkid=a4.id group by a4.id) t1 on t.id=t1.id where 1=1 and (sbthcd <=7 or zsyj is not null)
${unitcode}
${distcode}
and roadname like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and jhnf like '%'||(#{jhnf})||'%'
and (zszt like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or zszt is null) and sbthcd=7
and (decode(zszt,null,'未审核',zszt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or (zsyj is not null and sbthcd != 7))
and zsyj is not null and sbthcd != 7
and zsyj = '同意' and sbthcd = 7 and (decode(zszt,null,'未审核',zszt) like '已审核')
${jsdj}
${gldj}
and roadcode like '%'||(#{lxbm})||'%'
and throadcode like '%'||(#{throadcode})||'%'
and roadname like '%'||(#{throadname})||'%'
${tsdq}
and decode(t1.jhsl,null,'无','有') like #{bzls}||'%'
and xmklx like '%'||(#{xmklx})||'%'

select roadcode,roadname,min(roadstart) roadstart,max(roadends) roadend,substr(roadcode,length(roadcode)-5,6) distcode, (select name from xtgl_xzqh where id=substr(roadcode,length(roadcode)-5,6)) dist,F044 unitcode,F045 unit, decode(max(substr(F026, 0, 4)), null, max(substr(F025,0,4)), max(substr(F026, 0, 4))) xjgjnd,F114 jsdj,decode(substr(roadcode,1,1),'G','国道','S','省道','X','县道','Y','乡道') gldj from GPSROAD where substr(roadcode,1,1) in('G','S','X','Y') and F048='1' and roadcode like #{roadcode} ||'%'
and F044 in(select id from xtgl_department where id like '%'||substr(#{unitcode},0,4)||'_'||substr(#{unitcode},6)||'%' or parent like '%'||substr(#{unitcode},0,4)||'_'||substr(#{unitcode},6)||'%')
andROWNUM <=50 group by roadname,roadcode,F114,F044,F045 order by roadcode,roadstart
mapper.insert:
insert into XMK_AQSMFH
ID, PROVINCE, TOWN, COUNTY, UNIT,
UNITCODE,
ROADCODE,
JSDJ,
FANGX,

XJGJND,
ZLC,
SBTHCD,
yhlc,
gpsqd,
gpszd,
tbbmbm,
xuh,
xmklx, lsjl, lsxmxx,
sys_guid(),
#{province},
#{town},
#{county},
#{unit},
#{unitcode},

#{roadstart},
#{roadend},

#{ldfl},

#{lxxp},
#{doup},
#{sjbl},
#{lcxy},
#{hjfz},
#{jckbgf},
#{jtl},
#{xchbc},
#{csxsss},

#{aqssqt},
#{tjgc},
#{hjzz},

mapper.update:
update XMK_AQSMFH
PROVINCE = #{province},
TOWN = #{town},
COUNTY = #{county},
UNIT = #{unit},
UNITCODE = #{unitcode},
ROADCODE = #{roadcode},
JSDJ = #{jsdj},
FANGX = #{fangx},
ROADSTART = #{roadstart},
ROADEND = #{roadend},
PCSJ = #{pcsj},
LDFL = #{ldfl},
JTSGPCF = #{jtsgpcf},
JTSGFXDJ = #{jtsgfxdj},
GLTJPCF = #{gltjpcf},
GLFXDJ = #{glfxdj},
XBJYQX = #{xbjyqx},
LXXP = #{lxxp},
DOUP = #{doup},
SJBL = #{sjbl},
LCXY = #{lcxy},
HJFZ = #{hjfz},
JCKBGF = #{jckbgf},
JTL = #{jtl},
XCHBC = #{xchbc},
CSXSSS = #{csxsss},
HUL = #{hul},
BZBX = #{bzbx},
JSHSXYD = #{jshsxyd},
AQSSQT = #{aqssqt},
TJGC = #{tjgc},
HJZZ = #{hjzz},
BZBXCZ = #{bzbxcz},
JCKCZ = #{jckcz},
JZHL = #{jzhl},
JSHSXYDCZ = #{jshsxydcz},
AQSSQTCZ = #{aqssqtcz},
TZGS = #{tzgs},
JHNF = #{jhnf},
THROADCODE = #{throadcode},
THROADSTART = #{throadstart},
THROADEND = #{throadend},
SGPB = #{sgpb},
DGJW = #{dgjw},
LXJW = #{lxjw},
JTLPBZB = #{jtlpbzb},
DIST = #{dist},
DISTCODE = #{distcode},
SBZT = #{sbzt},
CSZT = #{cszt},
ZSZT = #{zszt},
CSYJ = #{csyj},
ZSYJ = #{zsyj},
ROADNAME = #{roadname},
GLDJ = #{gldj},
TSDQ = #{tsdq},
XJGJND = #{xjgjnd},
ZLC = #{zlc},
SBTHCD = #{sbthcd},
YHLC = #{yhlc},
gpsqd = #{gpsqd},
gpszd = #{gpszd},
xuh = #{xuh},
xmklx=#{xmklx},
lsjl=#{lsjl}, lsxmxx=#{lsxmxx},
where id=#{id}
update XMK_AQSMFH set sbzt='已上报',sbthcd=#{sbthcd} where id =#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from (select sc.*,xmld.tsdq,xmld.xmklx,xmld.throadname,xmld.throadcode from SCK_AQSMFH sc left join (select ld.xmbm,WMSYS.WM_CONCAT( distinct xm.xmklx) xmklx,WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(xm.tsdq) tsdq, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(xm.throadcode) throadcode, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(xm.roadname) throadname from sck_aqsmfh_ld ld left join xmk_aqsmfh xm on ld.xmkid=xm.id group by ld.xmbm) xmld on sc.xmbm=xmld.xmbm) t where 1=1 and (to_number(sbthbmcd) <=7 or shyj is not null)
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and jhnf in (${jhnf})
and (shzt like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or shzt is null) and sbthbmcd=7
and (decode(shzt,null,'未审核',shzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or (shyj is not null and sbthbmcd != 7))
and shyj is not null and sbthbmcd != 7
and shyj = '同意' and sbthbmcd = 7
${jsdj}
${gldj}
and lxbm like '%'||(#{lxbm})||'%'
and throadcode like '%'||(#{throadcode})||'%'
and throadname like '%'||(#{throadname})||'%'
${tsdq}
and bzls like '%'||(#{bzls})||'%'
and xmklx like '%'||(#{xmklx})||'%'

select count(*) sbthbmcd,decode(sum(yhlc),null,0,sum(yhlc)) yhlc,decode(sum(czzlc),null,0,sum(czzlc)) czzlc,sum(cztzgs) cztzgs,sum(nsqbbz) nsqbbz from (select sc.*,xmld.tsdq,xmld.throadname,xmld.xmklx, xmld.throadcode from SCK_AQSMFH sc left join (select ld.xmbm,WMSYS.WM_CONCAT( distinct xm.xmklx) xmklx,WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(xm.tsdq) tsdq, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(xm.throadcode) throadcode, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(xm.roadname) throadname from sck_aqsmfh_ld ld left join xmk_aqsmfh xm on ld.xmkid=xm.id group by ld.xmbm) xmld on sc.xmbm=xmld.xmbm) t where 1=1 and (to_number(sbthbmcd) <=7 or shyj is not null)
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and jhnf in (${jhnf})
and (shzt like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or shzt is null) and sbthbmcd=7
and (decode(shzt,null,'未审核',shzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or (shyj is not null and sbthbmcd != 7))
and shyj is not null and sbthbmcd != 7
and shyj = '同意' and sbthbmcd = 7
${jsdj}
${gldj}
and lxbm like '%'||(#{lxbm})||'%'
and throadcode like '%'||(#{throadcode})||'%'
and throadname like '%'||(#{throadname})||'%'
${tsdq}
and bzls like '%'||(#{bzls})||'%'
and xmklx like '%'||(#{xmklx})||'%'

select * from xmk_aqsmfh where 1=1
and unitcode like '%' || substr(#{unitcode}, 0, 4) || '_' || substr(#{unitcode}, 6) || '%'
and distcode like '%'||#{distcode}||'%'
and roadcode like '%'||#{roadcode}||'%'
mapper.insert:
insert into SCK_AQSMFH
ID,
PROVINCE,
TOWN,
COUNTY,
GYDW,
GYDWDM,
LXBM,

BZ,

ABLBZSQWH,
XZQHDM,

CSZT,

XMBM,
BZLS,
JHNF,
STR1,
STR2,
STR3,
STR4,
STR5,

STR8,
nsqbbz,
sys_guid(),
#{province},
#{town},
#{county},
#{gydw},
#{gydwdm},
#{lxbm},

#{zdzh},
#{sbzt},

#{shzt},
#{tbdwdm},

#{ablbzsqwh},

#{xzqh},

mapper.select: select * from SCK_AQSMFH where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from SCK_AQSMFH where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from XMK_AQSMFH where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update SCK_AQSMFH
PROVINCE = #{province},
TOWN = #{town},
COUNTY = #{county},
GYDW = #{gydw},
GYDWDM = #{gydwdm},
LXBM = #{lxbm},
JSDJ = #{jsdj},
QDZH = #{qdzh},
ZDZH = #{zdzh},
SBZT = #{sbzt},
LXMC = #{lxmc},
XJGJND = #{xjgjnd},
SBTHBMCD = #{sbthbmcd},
YHLC = #{yhlc},
FAPGDW = #{fapgdw},
FASCDW = #{fascdw},
FASPSJ = #{faspsj},
SPWH = #{spwh},
CZZLC = #{czzlc},
CZTZGS = #{cztzgs},
JSXZ = #{jsxz},
JSNR = #{jsnr},
BZ = #{bz},
SHZT = #{shzt},
TBDWDM = #{tbdwdm},
SFSQABLBZ = #{sfsqablbz},
ABLBZSQWH = #{ablbzsqwh},
XZQHDM = #{xzqhdm},
XZQH = #{xzqh},
CSZT = #{cszt},
CSYJ = #{csyj},
SHYJ = #{shyj},
XMBM = #{xmbm},
BZLS = #{bzls},
JHNF = #{jhnf},
STR1 = #{str1},
STR2 = #{str2},
STR3 = #{str3},
STR4 = #{str4},
STR5 = #{str5},
STR6 = #{str6},
STR7 = #{str7},
STR8 = #{str8},
nsqbbz = #{nsqbbz},
where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select T.* from XMK_AQSMFH T where 1=1 ${xmkid} order by xuh
select s.*, x.THROADCODE, x.THROADSTART, x.THROADEND from SCK_AQSMFH_LD s left join xmk_aqsmfh x on s.xmkid=x.id where 1=1 and s.xmbm=#{xmbm} order by s.xuh
mapper.insert: insert into SCK_AQSMFH_LD select sys_guid(),xm.province,xm.town,xm.county,xm.unit,xm.unitcode,xm.roadcode,xm.jsdj,xm.gpsqd,xm.gpszd,xm.roadname,xm.xjgjnd,xm.yhlc,xm.tzgs,xm.id,xm.distcode,xm.dist,xm.xuh,#{xmbm} xmbm,decode(xm.bzbxcz,'1','1','0'),decode(xm.jckcz,'1','1','0'),decode(xm.jzhl,'1','1','0'),decode(xm.tjgc,'1','1','0'),decode(xm.tjgc,'1','1','0'),decode(xm.hjzz,'1','1','0'),decode(xm.hjzz,'1','1','0'),'0' from xmk_aqsmfh xm where xm.id=#{xmkid}
mapper.select: select max(t.province) province,max(t.town) town,max(t.county) county,max(t.unit) gydw,max(t.unitcode) gydwdm,max(t.dist) xzqh,max(t.jsdj) jsdj,max(t.xjgjnd) xjgjnd, max(t.distcode) xzqhdm,max(t.roadcode) lxbm,max(t.roadname) lxmc,to_char(round(min(to_number(t.gpsqd)),3)) qdzh,to_char(round(max(to_number(t.gpszd)),3)) zdzh, to_char(round(max(to_number(t.gpsqd)),3)) qdzh1,to_char(round(min(to_number(t.gpszd)),3)) zdzh1, sum(yhlc) yhlc,sum(t.tzgs) cztzgs from XMK_AQSMFH t where 1=1 ${xmkid}

select max(t.province) province,max(t.town) town,max(t.county) county,max(t.gydw) gydw,max(t.gydwdm) gydwdm,max(t.xzqh) xzqh,max(t.jsdj) jsdj,max(t.xjgjnd) xjgjnd, max(t.xzqhdm) xzqhdm,max(t.lxbm) lxbm,max(t.lxmc) lxmc,to_char(round(min(to_number(t.qdzh)),3)) qdzh,to_char(round(max(to_number(t.zdzh)),3)) zdzh, sum(yhlc) yhlc,sum(t.cztzgs) cztzgs from SCK_AQSMFH_LD t where 1=1 and xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.update: update SCK_AQSMFH set sbzt='已上报',sbthbmcd=#{sbthbmcd} where id =#{id}
mapper.select:
select ld.xuh v_0,ld.province v_1,ld.town v_2,ld.county v_3,ld.lxbm v_4, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,ld.gydw,'') v_5,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,ld.xzqhdm,'') v_6,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.lxmc,'') v_7, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.jsdj,'') v_8,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.qdzh,'') v_9,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.zdzh,'') v_10, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.yhlc,'') v_11,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.czzlc,'') v_12,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.xjgjnd,'') v_13, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.fapgdw,'') v_14,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.fascdw,'') v_15,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.faspsj,'') v_16, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.spwh,'') v_17,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.nsqbbz,'') v_19,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.cztzgs,'') v_18,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.sfsqablbz,'') v_20, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.ablbzsqwh,'') v_21,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.jsxz,'') v_22,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.jsnr,'') v_23, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.bz,'') v_24 from sck_aqsmfh_ld ld,xmk_aqsmfh xm,SCK_AQSMFH sc,(select min(xuh) xuh,xmbm from sck_aqsmfh_ld group by xmbm) ld1 where ld.xmkid=xm.id and ld.xmbm=sc.xmbm and ld.xmbm=ld1.xmbm(+)and sc.jhnf is not null
${gydw}
${xzqhdm}
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and sc.jhnf like '%'||(#{jhnf})||'%'
and decode(sbthbmcd,'7','已上报',#{sbthbmcd},'未上报',sbzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||(#{gldj})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||(#{lxbm})||'%'
and tsdq like '%'||(#{tsdq})||'%'
and bzls like '%'||(#{bzls})||'%'
order by ld.xmbm,ld.xuh

select ld.xuh v_0,ld.province v_1,ld.town v_2,ld.county v_3,ld.lxbm v_4, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,ld.gydw,'') v_5,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,ld.xzqhdm,'') v_6,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.lxmc,'') v_7, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.jsdj,'') v_8,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.qdzh,'') v_9,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.zdzh,'') v_10, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.yhlc,'') v_11,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.czzlc,'') v_12,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.xjgjnd,'') v_13, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.fapgdw,'') v_14,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.fascdw,'') v_15,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.faspsj,'') v_16, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.spwh,'') v_17,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.nsqbbz,'') v_19,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.cztzgs,'') v_18,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.sfsqablbz,'') v_20, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.ablbzsqwh,'') v_21,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.jsxz,'') v_22,decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.jsnr,'') v_23, decode(ld.xuh,ld1.xuh,sc.bz,'') v_24 from sck_aqsmfh_ld ld,xmk_aqsmfh xm,SCK_AQSMFH sc,(select min(xuh) xuh,xmbm from sck_aqsmfh_ld group by xmbm) ld1 where ld.xmkid=xm.id and ld.xmbm=sc.xmbm and ld.xmbm=ld1.xmbm(+)and sc.jhnf is not null and (to_number(sbthbmcd) <=7)
${gydw}
${xzqh}
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and sc.jhnf like '%'||(#{jhnf})||'%'
and (shzt like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or shzt is null) and sbthbmcd=7
and (decode(shzt,null,'未审核',shzt) like '%'||(#{sbzt})||'%' or (shyj is not null and sbthbmcd != 7))
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||(#{gldj})||'%'
and lxbm like '%'||(#{lxbm})||'%'
and tsdq like '%'||(#{tsdq})||'%'
and bzls like '%'||(#{bzls})||'%'
order by ld.xmbm,ld.xuh
select sc.lxbm||'('||sc.lxmc||' '||sc.qdzh||','||sc.zdzh||')' lxbm from sck_aqsmfh_ld ld,sck_aqsmfh sc where ld.xmbm=sc.xmbm and sc.jhnf=#{jhnf} ${xmkid} and sc.xmbm not like #{xmbm}
